precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Sit comfortably with your right hand resting on a table.
Open your right hand palm side up with fingers relaxed and slightly spread.
Touch the tip of your right thumb to the tip of your index finger.
Release the thumb and index fingers
Touch the tip of your thumb to the tip of your middle finger.
Release the thumb and middle fingers
Touch the tip of your thumb to the tip of your ring finger.
Release the thumb and ring fingers
Touch the tip of your thumb to the tip of your pinky.
Release the thumb and the pinky.
